rooms.name: Twisted Caverns
rooms.effect: Target creature can't attack until your next turn.

rooms.name: Runestone Caverns
rooms.effect: Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them.

rooms.name: Muiral's Graveyard
rooms.effect: Create two 1/1 black Skeleton creature tokens.

rooms.name: Mad Wizard's Lair
rooms.effect: Draw three cards and reveal them. You may cast one of them without paying its mana cost.
